body:
These options use an alternate layout for ASCII node-link diagrams. The --term
option provides interactive selection through curses. The --termprint option
directs a static depiction to stdout.

![interactive-ascii-graph-python](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10036820/26613731/14bb98f2-4571-11e7-8252-e4c1b977ff0a.png)
![ascii-graph-ferret](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10036820/26613738/1873fad4-4571-11e7-9c6c-6e274d0c3e2f.png)
